title: Pixel 3a XL unable to make and receive phone calls under LTE network
content:
I haven't been able to make and receive phone calls under the LTE network in Hong Kong yet if I force the preferred network over to 3G, I am then able to make and receive phone calls. Tried the following methods but no joy so far:

- Clearing cache and user data didn't help
- Uninstalling/Reinstalling updates for the Phone app didn't help
- Placed the sim card into my old phone and there were no issues in making and receiving calls
- Placed another overseas sim card into my Pixel 3a XL and there were no issues in making and receiving phone calls under the 4G network and under roaming too
- Even when I magically end up being able to make or receive a phone call under the LTE network (which is like once out of every 10 attempts), the quality remains very poor and mobile data connection completely drops out
- Mobile data connection and signal strength remains fine when not making/receiving phone calls
- No network faults reports by the network operator in Hong Kong

Trying to avoid a complete factory reset so would really appreciate any solutions that might help!
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
